redhat.telemetry.enabled.markdownDescription: Enable usage data and errors to be sent to Red Hat servers. Read our [privacy statement](https://developers.redhat.com/article/tool-data-collection).

yaml.customTags.description: Custom tags for the parser to use

yaml.disableAdditionalProperties.description: Globally set additionalProperties to false for all objects. So if its true, no extra properties are allowed inside yaml.

yaml.disableDefaultProperties.description: Disable adding not required properties with default values into completion text.

yaml.extension.recommendations.description: Suggest additional extensions based on YAML usage.

yaml.format.bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces between brackets in objects

yaml.format.printWidth.description: Specify the line length that the printer will wrap on

yaml.format.proseWrap.description: Always: wrap prose if it exceeds the print width, Never: never wrap the prose, Preserve: wrap prose as-is

yaml.format.singleQuote.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes

yaml.format.trailingComma.description: Specify if trailing commas should be used in JSON-like segments of the YAML

yaml.keyOrdering.description: Enforces alphabetical ordering of keys in mappings when set to true

yaml.maxItemsComputed.description: The maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions computed (limited for performance reasons).

yaml.schemaStore.enable.description: Automatically pull available YAML schemas from JSON Schema Store

yaml.schemaStore.url.description: URL of schema store catalog to use

yaml.schemas.description: Associate schemas to YAML files in the current workspace

yaml.suggest.parentSkeletonSelectedFirst.description: If true, the user must select some parent skeleton first before autocompletion starts to suggest the rest of the properties. When yaml object is not empty, autocompletion ignores this setting and returns all properties and skeletons

yaml.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the YAML language service.
